title: New Passenger & Car Ferry From Incat Is 100% Electric
description:
Incat in Tasmania has completed a battery electric fast ferry for service between Argentina and Uruguay, thanks to European technology.

The post New Passenger & Car Ferry From Incat Is 100% Electric appeared first on CleanTechnica.
